Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Cicero
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily in both directions rerouted via Division, Kostner Augusta, Cicero and Division due to police activity near Division/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#70 Division buses are temporarily in both directions rerouted via Division, Kostner Augusta, Cicero and Division due to police activity near Division/Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.
